body_html: I think that instead of computing a full hessian of each op (these tests would be soooo slooow) we could just add some simple clauses to gradcheck that make sure that there exists a path from grad_input.grad_fn to grad_output's grad accumulator. This should be enough.
body_text: I think that instead of computing a full hessian of each op (these tests would be soooo slooow) we could just add some simple clauses to gradcheck that make sure that there exists a path from grad_input.grad_fn to grad_output's grad accumulator. This should be enough.
body: I think that instead of computing a full hessian of each op (these tests would be soooo slooow) we could just add some simple clauses to gradcheck that make sure that there exists a path from `grad_input.grad_fn` to `grad_output`'s grad accumulator. This should be enough.
